project.name: ISAAC: (MMP) Informatics Analytic Architecture
project.description: ISAAC: Informatics Analytic Architecture. ISAAC is a project to support tooling for a coherent informatics architecture that builds on top of a description-logic terminology foundation. This ISAAC parent pom that standardizes common dependencies and plugins for ISAAC modules.

organization.name: Organizations participating in ISAAC, ISAAC's KOMET, and SOLOR development include the US Veterans Health Administration, OSHERA, and the Health Services Platform Consortium.
